UPDATES: Thank you! I now have over 350 students and I am proud of all of you!

I am planning on adding bonus content in the future, if you become a student and like my work you can suggest for something for me to teach and I will give you credit for the idea!

After this course, you will know how to make games within hours, or weeks!

This course is exclusively on Udemy!

With just 5 hours of commitment, you will learn how to build games and code.

You will look like the hardcore developers that you thought were gifted.

And now you can be gifted yourself!

  • With no budget
  • With no background knowledge
  • With no high end PC

You can be the developer you always dreamed of!

Join the journey to become a master at Gamemaker: Studio

In just one course, you will learn how to use and understand the GML language in Gamemaker: Studio. By making your own platform game, you will discover basics of Gamemaker and how to handle situations you have within your code.

My Story

I started off knowing no programming knowledge whatsoever with Gamemaker being my first programming language. I wanted to be the best game creator possible. I didn't become the best, but I knew how to make games that could make me income. My first completed game got me an offer of $120. I made that game within 12 hours with rarely any programming experience whatsoever. Now, I can make games with ease and make them look professional.

I want to share my success in making games with you!

One time, I spent around an hour making a joke game and uploaded it to Gamejolt! Within a couple of days I had gained money from ad revenue and I had many people playing my game and had received 2.7K views. Many people on YouTube even uploaded themselves playing it!

I want you to experience the feeling of success I have had with making games. It isn't the profit that just matters, but the feeling of accomplishment and the sense that "I made this"

This course will help you learn Gamemaker Studio!

This course is packed with Gamemaker Studio tutorials to help you reach your goal!

Everyday you will be left wondering how to make games.

If you don't learn anything, you can get your money back within your first 30 days of owning this course! Buying this course is no risk!

Want to satisfy that temptation?

Join the 300 students and counting! Click the take this course button now!
title: Learn Gamemaker Studio with no past programming experience!
